org.uclab.mm.icl.llc.AR.iar

Class AR_FeatureExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.uclab.mm.icl.llc.AR.iar.AR_FeatureExtractor

  • public class AR_FeatureExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for extracting features. It contains feature calculation functions and function to return feature list.
    Author:
    Tae ho Hur

        get integrated model's featured data(with 50 features)
        Parameters:
        SaccX - Smartphone's accelerometer dataX
        SaccY - Smartphone's accelerometer dataY
        SaccZ - Smartphone's accelerometer dataZ
        WaccX - Smart watch's accelerometer dataX

        WaccZ - Smart watch's accelerometer dataZ

        SgyroZ - Smartphone's gyroscope dataZ
        WgyroX - Smart watch's gyroscope dataX

        feature list.
